New Records: Pooran goes on rampage as Omarzai bowls joint most expensive over in T20Is
Key Match Events: Pooran bursts on to the T20 World Cup, pedal to the metal
Pooran overtakes Gayle; West Indies score their highest T20 World Cup total
Pooran 98, McCoy three-for blow Afghanistan away
Pre-Game Insights: WI and Afghanistan look to protect unbeaten records in last clash before Super Eight
Pitches in St Lucia have been friendlier to batters than most in this World Cup, with three totals of 180 or more in four innings so far
Miscellaneous Highlights: Time for Johnson Charles to put on a show
Hazratullah Zazai replaces the injured Mujeeb Ur Rahman in Afghanistan squad
